Before coding check :

## Strict Rules
- Always use existing patterns, don't invent new code
- Maintain backward compatibility with existing templates
- Never create emoji on the UX interface, only for console.log

## Use Design Documentations MD3
- material-component-android : https://github.com/material-components/material-components-android/tree/master/docs/components

- Guide : https://m3.material.io/blog/building-with-m3-expressive?utm_source=GD&utm_medium=embedded_marketing&utm_campaign=IO25
